languages.text: {n}Ксенос задумывается на мгновение.{/n} "Не думаю, что это возможно. Трехокие мон-кай осквернили это место, и я не намерен рисковать Камнем Душ только для того, что помочь им избежать последствий плачевной игры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксенос задумывается на мгновение.{/n} "Не думаю, что это возможно. Трехокие мон-кай осквернили это место, и я не намерен рисковать Камнем Душ только для того, что помочь им избежать последсвий плачевной игры".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}The xenos thinks for a moment.{/n} "I do not believe there is. The three-eyed mon-keigh have desecrated this place, and I will not put the Spirit Monolith at risk just to help them avoid the consequences of a lamentable performance."

languages.text: {n}異種族は少し考える。{/n}「ないと思うよ。三つ目モン＝ケイはこの場所で冒涜を続けてきた。それに、哀しみ誘うパフォーマンスを受けたからといって、祖先を救うことなくスピリット・モノリスを危険にさらしておくつもりもない」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos thinks for a moment.{/n} "I do not believe there is. The three-eyed mon-keigh have desecrated this place, and I will not put the Spirit Monolith at risk just to help them avoid the consequences of a lamentable performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は少し考える。{/n}「ないと思うよ。三つ目モン＝ケイはこの場所で冒涜を続けてきた。それに、哀しみ誘うパフォーマンスを受けたからといって、祖先を救うことなくスピリット・モノリスを危険にさらしておくつもりもない」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}丑角思考了一会儿。{/n}“恐怕没有这样的办法。那些三眼猴子亵渎了这片圣地，我不打算仅仅为了帮助他们避开可悲的结局，就让巨型灵魂石处于危险之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos thinks for a moment.{/n} "I do not believe there is. The three-eyed mon-keigh have desecrated this place, and I will not put the Spirit Monolith at risk just to help them avoid the consequences of a lamentable performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角思考了一会儿。{/n}“恐怕没有这样的办法。那些三眼猴子亵渎了这片圣地，我不打算仅仅为了帮助他们避开可悲的结局，就让巨型灵魂石处于危险之中。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Le xénos prend le temps de la réflexion.{/n} « Je ne crois pas. Les mon-keigh à trois yeux ont profané ces lieux, et je ne mettrai pas le Monolithe aux esprits en péril juste pour leur éviter de subir les conséquences de leur piètre performance. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos thinks for a moment.{/n} "I do not believe there is. The three-eyed mon-keigh have desecrated this place, and I will not put the Spirit Monolith at risk just to help them avoid the consequences of a lamentable performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos prend le temps de la réflexion.{/n} « Je ne crois pas. Les mon-keigh à trois yeux ont profané ces lieux, et je ne mettrai pas le Monolithe aux esprits en péril juste pour leur éviter de subir les conséquences de leur piètre performance. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}El xenos piensa durante un momento.{/n} «No creo que la haya. Los mon-keigh de tres ojos han profanado este lugar y no tengo intención de poner en riesgo el Monolito Espiritual solo para ayudarles a evitar las consecuencias de su terrible actuación».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos thinks for a moment.{/n} "I do not believe there is. The three-eyed mon-keigh have desecrated this place, and I will not put the Spirit Monolith at risk just to help them avoid the consequences of a lamentable performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos piensa durante un momento.{/n} «No creo que la haya. Los mon-keigh de tres ojos han profanado este lugar y no tengo intención de poner en riesgo el Monolito Espiritual solo para ayudarles a evitar las consecuencias de su terrible actuación».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos denkt einen Augenblick lang nach.{/n} "Das glaube ich nicht. Die dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey haben diese Welt entweiht, und ich werde den Geistesmonolith nicht in Gefahr bringen, nur um ihnen zu helfen, die Konsequenzen eines beklagenswerten Auftritts zu vermeiden."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos thinks for a moment.{/n} "I do not believe there is. The three-eyed mon-keigh have desecrated this place, and I will not put the Spirit Monolith at risk just to help them avoid the consequences of a lamentable performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos denkt einen Augenblick lang nach.{/n} "Ich glaube nicht. Die dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey haben diese Welt entweiht, und ich werde den Geistesmonolith nicht in Gefahr bringen, nur um ihnen zu helfen, die Konsequenzen eines beklagenswerten Auftritts zu vermeiden.
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Zeno, bir anlığına düşünüyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum. Üç gözlü mon-keighler, kadim dünyamızın kutsallığına saygısızlık etti. Perişan bir performansın sonuçlarına katlanmak zorunda kalmasınlar diye Ruh Monoliti'ni riske atacak değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos thinks for a moment.{/n} "I do not believe there is. The three-eyed mon-keigh have desecrated this place, and I will not put the Spirit Monolith at risk just to help them avoid the consequences of a lamentable performance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno, bir anlığına düşünüyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum. Üç gözlü mon-keighler, kadim dünyamızın kutsallığına saygısızlık etti. Perişan bir performansın sonuçlarına katlanmamalarını sağlamak için Ruh Monoliti'ni riske atacak değilim."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
